00037 void advDisplay_printVoltage(){
00038                 char output[20] = "";
00039                 double volt = 0;
00040 
00041                 //get currente voltage value
00042                 bot_update();
00043                 //calculate the voltage from adc-value
00044                 volt = 0.0166 * bot_supply -1.19;
00045                 //concat output string
00046                 sprintf(output, "VCC: %2.1f V", volt);

00071 void advDisplay_clear(){
00072 
00073         int i = 0;
00074         //stop interrupts
00075         cli();
00076 
00077         //clear with whitespaces
00078         for(i = 10; i <= 50; i = i +10){
00079                 gfx_move(logo_width, i);
00080                 gfx_print_text("             ");
00081         }
00082 
00083         for(i = 0; i < terminal_lines; i++){
00084                 strcpy(terminal_text[i],"                    ");
00085         }
00086 
00087         terminal_head = 0;
00088         terminal_count = 0;
00089 
00090         //enable interrupts
00091         sei();
00092 }

00098 void advDisplay_append_line(char *txt){
00099 
00100         //calculate index for the new line in terminal_text
00101         int index = (terminal_head + terminal_count)%terminal_lines;
00102 
00103         //copy the line into terminal_text array at calculated index
00104         strcpy(terminal_text[index], txt);
00105 
00106         if(terminal_count < 5){
00107                 terminal_count++;
00108         }
00109         else{
00110                 terminal_head = (terminal_head++)%terminal_lines;
00111         }
00112         //refresh the terminal output on the display
00113         advDisplay_printTerminal();
00114 }

00119 void advDisplay_printTerminal(){
00120         int i;
00121         int index;
00122 
00123         for(i = 0; i < terminal_count;i++){
00124 
00125                 //clear line
00126                 gfx_move(logo_width,10 + 10*i);
00127                 gfx_print_text("                      ");
00128 
00129                 //print line
00130                 index = (terminal_head + i)%terminal_lines;
00131                 gfx_move(logo_width,10 + 10*i);
00132                 gfx_print_text(terminal_text[index]);
00133                 delay(10);
00134         }
